attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i herebuy would like us the people of the united kingdom to dismount parliment as they "parliment" do not help us and listen to what we say and they sent our kingdom to war in which i did not want them to do and im sure many other people didnt either and they belive in getting richer for them selfs and not give a care in the world about us "the people of the united kingdom" so i say give back power to the people "us" and let us re-claime what is ours

rejection.details: If you choose to resubmit, could you please be more explicit.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
